myRecipes.name: Chicken Parmesan
myRecipes.description: This classic Italian dish features crispy breaded chicken topped with tomato sauce and melted mozzarella cheese. Serve with a side of spaghetti for a comforting and satisfying meal.

myRecipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
myRecipes.description: This hearty and flavorful dish features tender beef strips in a creamy mushroom sauce. Serve over a bed of egg noodles for a comforting and filling meal.

myRecipes.name: Roasted Vegetable Lasagna
ingredients: 2 cups chopped mixed vegetables (such as zucchini, eggplant, and bell peppers)
myRecipes.description: This vegetarian lasagna is packed with roasted vegetables and layers of cheesy goodness. Serve with a side salad for a complete and satisfying meal.

myRecipes.name: Teriyaki Salmon
myRecipes.description: This flavorful dish features succulent salmon fillets coated in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce. Serve with steamed rice and a side of stir-fried vegetables for a healthy and delicious meal.

myRecipes.name: Pesto Pasta
myRecipes.description: This simple yet satisfying pasta dish features al dente spaghetti coated in a rich and flavorful basil pesto sauce. Top with toasted pine nuts and grated Parmesan cheese for a delicious and easy meal.

myRecipes.name: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: 1 pound chicken breast, sliced into thin strips
myRecipes.description: These sizzling chicken fajitas are a crowd-pleaser! Seasoned with chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, and paprika, the chicken is cooked alongside bell peppers and onions for a colorful and delicious meal. Serve with warm flour tortillas and your favorite toppings.

myRecipes.name: Garlic Shrimp Scampi
myRecipes.description: This delicious shrimp scampi is loaded with garlicky, lemony flavors and perfect for a quick weeknight dinner. The shrimp is cooked in a white wine and lemon sauce and served over a bed of linguine pasta.

myRecipes.name: Creamy Mushroom Soup
myRecipes.description: This creamy mushroom soup is a comforting and flavorful dish perfect for chilly nights. The soup is loaded with sliced mushrooms and seasoned with thyme, garlic, salt and pepper, and finished with a splash of heavy cream for a luscious texture.

myRecipes.name: Slow Cooker Beef Stew
myRecipes.description: This hearty beef stew is perfect for a cozy winter meal. The beef is slow cooked in a flavorful broth with carrots, potatoes, onion, garlic, tomato paste, thyme, and bay leaf until tender and delicious.

myRecipes.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches
ingredients: Sliced red onion and pickles, for serving
myRecipes.description: This delicious pulled pork sandwich recipe is perfect for a summer BBQ or game day party. The pork shoulder is slow cooked in a tangy, smoky BBQ sauce until it's tender and falling apart, then served on a soft brioche bun with sliced red onion and pickles.

myRecipes.name: Caprese Salad
myRecipes.description: This classic Caprese salad is a simple and delicious way to enjoy fresh summer tomatoes. Layers of ripe tomato and creamy mozzarella cheese are drizzled with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, then topped with torn basil leaves, salt, and pepper.

myRecipes.name: Chicken and Broccoli Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, sliced
myRecipes.description: This quick and easy chicken and broccoli stir fry is a healthy and flavorful weeknight dinner option. Sliced chicken breast is stir fried with broccoli florets, red bell pepper, and onion in a sweet and savory sauce made with soy sauce, honey, ginger, and garlic.

myRecipes.name: Pesto Pasta with Roasted Tomatoes
myRecipes.description: This flavorful pesto pasta is loaded with fresh basil and topped with roasted cherry tomatoes. The pesto is made with pine nuts, garlic, Parmesan cheese, and olive oil and is tossed with spaghetti pasta until perfectly coated.

myRecipes.name: Baked Chicken Parmesan
myRecipes.description: This classic baked chicken Parmesan recipe is a crowd-pleasing dinner option that is easy to make. Chicken breasts are coated in a mixture of breadcrumbs and Parmesan cheese, then baked in the oven with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese until golden and bubbly.

myRecipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir Fry
myRecipes.description: This beef and broccoli stir fry is a quick and easy dinner option that is perfect for busy weeknights. Thinly sliced flank steak is stir fried with broccoli, red bell pepper, ginger, and garlic, and coated in a sweet and savory sauce made with soy sauce, brown sugar, and cornstarch.
